comments.author: nanlei
comments.body: The pdf copy of the translation of HttpClient manual

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Committed to the contrib package
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/httpcomponents/httpclient/trunk/httpclient-contrib/docs/translated-tutorial/httpclient-tutorial-simplified-chinese.pdf

I am also going to add a link to the document to the project's front page.

Nanlei, many thanks for contributing the document

Oleg

description: During Nov 2010, The Chinese user Nanlei translated the Apache HttpClient manual into Chinese and contribute it to HttpClient project freely. In the future, the Chinese translation of HttpCore manual will be finished and contribute to HttpCore project freely too.
